content.en_us: An [[external heat source|External Heat Source]] powered by flammable fluids, usually derivatives of [[oil|Crude Oil]]. Needs to be turned on in the GUI to function. The flow rate can be increased using a screwdriver, from 1mB/t to 10mB/t.
content.zh_cn:
一种由可燃流体供能的[[外部热源|External Heat Source]]，
常燃烧来自[[原油|Crude Oil]]的流体。需要在GUI中开机才会工作。可使
用螺丝刀调整内部流体的燃烧速率，
范围从1mB/t到10mB/t.
